title: Untitled Jewelry Project
description: It's the project that is cool.

suppliers.name: Hoover & Strong
suppliers.description:
**Trade only** 

### Recycled Products

In general, products made in house are SCS certified recycled. These products are sold under the label "Harmony" and include a Harmony symbol next to the listings.  

**NOTE:** There is a list of specific findings that are not made in house and are not certified recycled: [View List](https://www.hooverandstrong.com/non-recycled-items/) This list does not appear to be complete as all chains sold by H&S are not produced in house and therefore not certified recycled/Harmony. These items do have a symbol next to them which looks like the Harmony symbol but crossed out in red. 

### [Artisanal Products](https://www.hooverandstrong.com/artisanal)

Sold under their own label of "Harmony Artisanal" includes Fairmined, Fairtrade, and [Harmony Fair Congo]() (Hoover and Strong's own initiative of "fully traceable, conflict-free artisanal gold from the Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC)")
